articles.content: LONDON (AP) Energy giant BP said Tuesday that it earned nearly $2.6 billion in the second quarter, almost half what it posted in the first three months of the year as oil and natural gas prices that … [+1989 chars]

articles.author: Michelle Toh
articles.title: HSBC raises outlook as profits nearly double - CNN
articles.description: HSBC’s profits have soared as it continues to cut costs and cash in on high interest rates around the world.
articles.content:
HSBCs profits have soared as it continues to cut costs and cash in on high interest rates around the world.
